Type.Name: IColumnMapping
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: The interface enables an inheriting class to implement a Column Mapping class, which associates a data source column with a column. For more information, see [<topic://cpconsettingupdatatabledatacolumnmappings>].
An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits .

Classes that inherit must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. For example, the interface defines the property. In turn, the class inherits this property, and also defines the method.

summary.para: Associates a data source column with a column, and is implemented by the class, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'string'

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the column within the to map to.

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'string'

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the column within the data source to map from. The name is case-sensitive.
